Desc.entry: A subsidiary of the Sheffield City Trust (see separate entry) and a trust operating company which administers the following leisure facilities: Don Valley Stadium, Hillsborough Leisure Centre, Ponds Forge, Sheffield Arena, English Institute of Sport (Sheffield), Sheffield City Hall, Concord Sports Centre, Beauchief, Birley Wood and Tinsley Golf Courses and Ice Sheffield. SIV holds an annual company conference in May/June.
